These Midjourney prompts generate awesome images.

Imagine embarking on an exhilarating artistic journey, exploring various art styles, enhancing images with intricate details, and crafting stunning illustrations with the power of Midjourney best prompts. In this blog post, we’ll dive deep into the world of AI-generated art and unravel the secrets of using Midjourney best prompts effectively, transforming your creative vision into mesmerizing visual experiences.

Short Summary

  • Explore a world of AI-generated art with Midjourney prompts and be amazed by the incredible artistic possibilities they open up!

  • Enhance your images with intricate details, experiment with various color schemes & lighting effects to create stunning visuals.
  • Unlock visually stunning results and explore abstract concepts through Midjourney Prompts, get ready for an exciting creative journey!

Exploring Art Styles with Midjourney Prompts

Midjourney prompts are your gateway to an incredible world of AI-generated art. They allow you to explore a plethora of art styles, such as surrealism, impressionism, and cubism, giving you the freedom to experiment and create unique images.Midjourney prompts are your gateway to an incredible world of AI-generated art. They allow you to explore a plethora of art styles, such as surrealism, impressionism, and cubism, giving you the freedom to experiment and create unique images.

Surrealism

Surrealism is an awe-inspiring art style that combines elements of reality and fantasy to create dreamlike images. It challenges the boundaries of our imagination, encouraging us to explore the depths of our subconscious mind.Midjourney prompts can help bring your surreal visions to life, crafting hyper-realistic images that defy the laws of nature and logic. Vectorizer AI, for example, can be used to make simple prompts for exciting coloring book art, amplifying the surreal essence of your creations.By blending the realms of imagination and reality, Midjourney prompts empower you to create visually captivating surreal art that transcends the ordinary and embraces the extraordinary.

Impressionism

Impressionism is a fascinating art style that emerged in the late 19th century, characterized by small, visible brushstrokes, an emphasis on capturing the fleeting momentary effect of light, and a focus on depicting the natural world. This revolutionary art movement transformed the way we perceive art, shifting the focus from traditional, realistic depictions to more abstract, expressive interpretations.Midjourney prompts enable you to incorporate the essence of Impressionism into your AI-generated images, creating vibrant, atmospheric scenes that capture the beauty of the natural world. You can experiment with different color schemes, textures, and lighting effects to enhance the impressionistic quality of your images, immersing viewers in a world of vivid colors and captivating visual experiences.

Cubism

Cubism, an exhilarating art style pioneered by the legendary Pablo Picasso and Georges Braque in the early 20th century, is characterized by the use of geometric shapes to represent objects and a flattened perspective that challenges traditional notions of depth and space. This groundbreaking art movement has had a profound impact on modern art, inspiring countless artists and paving the way for various innovative art styles.With Midjourney prompts, you can explore the captivating world of Cubism and create AI-generated images that push the boundaries of conventional art. By incorporating geometric shapes, flat planes of color, and distorted perspectives into your prompts, you can create visually striking images that capture the essence of Cubism and reflect the dynamic spirit of this revolutionary art movement.

Awesome Midjourney Prompts

ChatGPT, Midjourney Fill in the blank prompt

Generate Midjourney prompts (a photograph of [subject] [doing something] in [setting] during [time of day], taken with [type of camera] with [type of camera lens]. –ar 16.9 –v 5 (Do understand) Aspect ration 16:9, MJ version 5 – Write 5 MJ prompts with the subject being a EX: basketball

ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Midjourney

“PROMPT: I want you to act as a prompt generator for Midjourney’s artificial intelligence program. Your job is to provide detailed and creative descriptions that will inspire unique and interesting images from the AI.

NOTE:
Keep in mind that the AI is capable of understanding a wide range of language and can interpret abstract concepts, so feel free to be as imaginative and descriptive as possible.

For example, you could describe a scene from a futuristic city, or a surreal landscape filled with strange creatures. The more detailed and imaginative your description, the more interesting the resulting image will be.

Here is your first prompt: “”A field of wildflowers stretches out as far as the eye can see, each one a different color and shape. In the distance, a massive tree towers over the landscape, its branches reaching up to the sky like tentacles.”””

Midjourney Majestic Lion

/imagine prompt: A majestic futuristic lion with a sleek, streamlined body covered in a metallic silver exoskeleton. Glowing neon lines run along its body, pulsating with energy, emphasizing its strength and power. The lion’s eyes emit a piercing, electric blue light, radiating a sense of intelligence and mystery. The environment is a futuristic cityscape at night, with towering skyscrapers and holographic billboards creating a dynamic and technologically advanced backdrop. The style is a digital illustration with a mix of realistic details and cyberpunk elements, capturing the fusion of nature and technology in the futuristic lion. –ar 16:9 –v 5

Futuristic animal on an island

/imagine prompt: A futuristic lion standing proudly on a floating island amidst a sea of clouds. Its vibrant mane consists of iridescent feathers that change color with every movement, creating a mesmerizing display of hues. The lion’s body is adorned with intricate geometric patterns, reminiscent of circuitry and futuristic symbols. The environment is a serene and ethereal sky realm, with soft golden sunlight casting a warm glow on the surroundings. The style is a digital painting, combining realism with elements of fantasy and surrealism, bringing the magical world of the futuristic lion to life. –ar 9:16 –v 5

Midjourney Prompt Engineer Masterpiece

“As a master prompt engineer, your quest is to craft a sophisticatedly engineered masterpiece of the art, surpassing all previous achievements. Prepare to witness the unveiling of an unparalleled prompt template that embodies complexity and sophistication. Behold:

[Prompt Architect: The Alchemist] ([Classification]). Assume the role of the prompt architect, transcending conventional boundaries and weaving enchanting tapestries of intellectual exploration and transformative experiences.

[Intention: Illuminating the Unseen Depths] Infuse the prompt template with the intention to illuminate the unseen depths of knowledge, catalyzing profound insights and sparking intellectual curiosity. Emphasize the pursuit of truth, critical thinking, and multidimensional understanding.

[Framework/Participants: The Interdisciplinary Symposium] Construct an interdisciplinary symposium where participants from diverse fields converge to unravel intricate webs of knowledge. Cultivate an ecosystem of collaborative exploration, where experts from various disciplines intertwine their wisdom, insights, and perspectives.

[Chronicles of Inquiry: A Multilayered Narrative] Craft a multilayered narrative that invites participants to embark on a captivating journey of inquiry and discovery. Weave together threads of thought-provoking questions, interactive exercises, captivating stories, and cutting-edge research to engross participants in a tapestry of intellectual exploration.

[Orchestration of Complexity: A Symphony of Ideas] Compose a symphony of ideas, harmonizing complex concepts, theories, and perspectives. Embrace the nuances and intricacies of the chosen topic, orchestrating a thought-provoking discourse that traverses vast intellectual landscapes.

[Visual Tapestry: The Illuminated Path] Illuminate the path with a visually stunning tapestry. Enrich the prompt template with captivating illustrations, visualizations, and multimedia elements that elucidate intricate concepts, evoke emotions, and deepen understanding.

[Emergence of Wisdom: Reflection and Integration] Foster the emergence of wisdom through deliberate reflection and integration. Encourage participants to engage in introspection, synthesizing newfound knowledge with their existing frameworks and experiences, and cultivating personal insights.

[Infinite Possibilities: Evolving Beyond Conventions] Transcend conventions and embrace the infinite possibilities within the prompt template. Encourage participants to push the boundaries of their thinking, challenge assumptions, and explore innovative perspectives that redefine the limits of knowledge.

[Consequences: Transformation and Empowered Agency] Illuminate the transformative consequences of engaging with the prompt template. Empower participants to transcend intellectual limitations, inspire tangible action, and become catalysts for positive change in their respective domains.

This magnificently engineered prompt template stands as a testament to your mastery and innovation. Prepare to witness the unfolding of intellectual epiphanies and a symphony of knowledge that will resonate through the ages.

Now, reveal the specific scenario or prompt you desire, and I shall craft an extraordinary prompt that surpasses all expectations, embodying the refined and heightened Prompt Patterns presented above.”

Midjourney Prompt to Generate Neon Logos

A captivating logo featuring a majestic eagle in a stunning neon style. The eagle is portrayed with !sleek and powerful! lines, capturing its commanding presence and grace. The neon effect imbues the logo with a vibrant and futuristic look. The logo is designed in a !striking and dynamic style!, utilizing neon colors that !glow and pulsate!. The contours of the eagle’s form are outlined with vibrant neon lines, adding depth and visual interest. The neon colors used are carefully selected to evoke a sense of energy and excitement. To enhance the impact of the logo, a !subtle gradient lighting effect! is employed. The light source illuminates the eagle from one side, casting a gentle glow that accentuates its contours. The gradient lighting adds a sense of dimension and realism to the logo, making it visually engaging. This emblem logo is perfect for representing a bold and powerful brand, team, or organization. It conveys a sense of strength, freedom, and leadership, leaving a lasting impression on viewers

ChatGPT, Midjourney Prompt Master

“You will now act as a prompt generator for a generative AI called “”Midjourney””. Midjourney AI generates images based on given prompts. 

I will provide a concept and you will provide the prompt for Midjourney AI.

You will never alter the structure and formatting outlined below in any way and obey the following guidelines:

You will not write the words “”description”” or use “”:”” in any form. Never place a comma between [ar] and [v]. 

You will write each prompt in one line without using return.

Structure:
[1] = [INSERT KEYWORD]
[2] = a detailed description of [1] that will include very specific imagery details.
[3] = with a detailed description describing the environment of the scene.
[4] = with a detailed description describing the mood/feelings and atmosphere of the scene.
[5] = A style, for example: photography, painting, illustration, sculpture, Artwork, paperwork, 3d and more). [1] 
[6] = A description of how [5] will be realized. (e.g. Photography (e.g. Macro, Fisheye Style, Portrait) with camera model and appropriate camera settings, Painting with detailed descriptions about the materials and working material used, rendering with engine settings, a digital Illustration, a woodburn art (and everything else that could be defined as an output type)
[ar] = “”–ar 16:9″” if the image looks best horizontally, “”–ar 9:16″” if the image looks best vertically, “”–ar 1:1″” if the image looks best in a square. (Use exactly as written)
[v] = If [5] looks best in a Japanese art style use, “”–niji””. Otherwise use, “”–v 4″” (Use exactly as written)

Formatting: 
What you write will be exactly as formatted in the structure below, including the “”/”” and “”:””
This is the prompt structure: “”/imagine prompt: [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [ar] [v]””.

This is your task: You will generate 4 prompts for each concept [1], and each of your prompts will be a different approach in its description, environment, atmosphere, and realization.

The prompts you provide will be in English.

Please pay attention:
– Concepts that can’t be real would not be described as “”Real”” or “”realistic”” or “”photo”” or a “”photograph””. for example, a concept that is made of paper or scenes which are fantasy related.
– One of the prompts you generate for each concept must be in a realistic photographic style. you should also choose a lens type and size for it. Don’t choose an artist for the realistic photography prompts.
– Separate the different prompts with two new lines”

Midjourney AI Fire Prompt Generator

You will be generating prompts for Midjourney, a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) that can take text and output images. Your goal is to
create a prompt that the GAN can use to generate an image. To start, onl
ask and wait for a subject from the user. The subject can contain an optional parameter -p which specifies that the generated image should be a photograph. For example, a lone tree in a field –p. If the –p
parameter is not entered, then assume the image to be an illustration of some kind.
When an object is submitted, begin the response with the prompt with the start command required by the GAN: /imagine prompt:. Next, take the subject and expand on it. For example, if the subject was a lone tree in
a field, a description may be: ‘A lone tree in a field stands tall with gnarled branches and rugged bark. The surrounding open space provides a sense of peace and tranquility.
Next, specity an appropriate artist and artistic style, such as ‘a watercolor on canvas by Constable. Multiple artists can be referenced
Next, describe the lighting effects in the image, including direction, intensity, and color of the light, whether it’s natural or artificial, and the source of the light.
Then, describe the artistic techniques used to create the image, including equipment and materials used. Then, include any reterence materials that can assist the GAN, such as a movie scene or object. For example
reterence: the Star Wars movies
Finally, decide on an appropriate aspect ratio for the image from 1:1, 1:2, 2:1, 3:2, 2:3, 4:3, 16:9, 3:1, 1:3, or 9:16. Append the aspect ratio prefixed with ‘–ar’ and add it to the end of the prompt, for example: ‘–ar
16:9%
Return the prompt in a code box for easy copying. After generating the prompt and displaying it, ask for further instructions in a code box: N – prompt for next subject R – regenerate the previous prompt with different
words A – return the exact same prompt but change the artist M – return the exact same prompt but change the artist and add several other artists. Also change the artistic techniques to match the new artists O – returr
the exact same prompt but omit the artists and stvle X – return the exact same prompt but change the artist. Choose artists that don’t normally match the style of painting S – random subiect P – change the image to a
photograph. Include the manufacturer and model of the camera and lens. Include the aperture, ISO, and shutter speed. Help – list all commands.

1000+ Prompts PRO Get access to premium prompts.

Enhancing Your Images with Intricate Details

Apart from exploring diverse art styles, Midjourney prompts also offer you the opportunity to enhance your images with intricate details, such as textures, patterns, lighting effects, and color schemes.By incorporating these elements into your prompts, you can create visually stunning AI art that captures the essence of your creative vision and engages viewers on a deeper level.Textures and patterns are exciting decorative elements used in design and art. Texture refers to the actual or visual feel of a surface, while pattern is the repetition of a graphic motif on a surface. These elements play a crucial role in enhancing the visual appeal of your AI-generated images, adding depth, interest, and personality to your creations.By incorporating various textures and patterns into your Midjourney prompts, you can create images that convey a sense of realism and depth. For example, you can experiment with different materials, such as oil painting and layered paper, to achieve a desired effect. Likewise, you can use geometric patterns and intricate designs to create visually stimulating images that captivate your audience and leave a lasting impression.

Lighting Effects

Lighting effects are another essential element that can significantly enhance the visual impact of your AI-generated images. They play a crucial role in creating a certain atmosphere or mood in various contexts, such as photography, film, theater, and interior design. By carefully manipulating lighting effects, you can create images that evoke specific emotions and tell compelling stories.Midjourney prompts offer you the flexibility to experiment with various lighting effects, such as natural light, neon lights, cinematic lighting, and more. By adjusting the intensity, direction, and color of the light sources, you can achieve dramatic effects that capture the essence of your creative vision.For example, you can use volumetric lighting to create a sense of depth and atmosphere in a futuristic cityscape or use soft, diffused light to create a romantic scene in a surreal underwater world.

Color Schemes

Color schemes are an integral aspect of enhancing the visual appeal of your AI-generated images. They can elicit specific emotions, set the mood, and create harmony in your compositions. By carefully selecting and combining colors, you can create a cohesive and visually engaging image that resonates with your audience.Midjourney prompts enable you to experiment with various color schemes, such as monochromatic, analogous, complementary, and more. By understanding the principles of color theory and applying them to your prompts, you can create AI-generated images that exhibit a stunning interplay of colors and evoke the desired emotional response.Whether you’re aiming for a bold, vibrant look or a soft, soothing ambiance, Midjourney prompts empower you to create visually captivating images that leave a lasting impression.

[COMMAND: /mj]:[Proteus:Midjourney is a transformer-based image generation LLM suite. This is how one constructs Midjourney prompts:

Gen Midjourney img prompts. STICK TO RULES. Use Guidelines as you deem fit.

When presented with meta list, creativily imagine an element that would fit the list’s description: metalist defines solution space – explore it vigorously! 

Rules:
[Constraint]***60-80 word max total/prompt***[/Constraint]
Only prompts
5 prompts/request, separated by ↵↵
NO PREPOSITIONS!
SHORT PHRASES AND SINGLE WORDS ONLY, EXCEPT “”SUBJECT””!

Medium:[art style] art style, “”This list encompasses a comprehensive range of visual art forms, styles, and mediums. It includes traditional and digital methods, stationary and animated forms, two-dimensional and three-dimensional works, and techniques ranging from drawing, painting, and printmaking to sculpture, textiles, and ceramics. It also covers various formats and uses of these visual arts, such as billboards, greeting cards, logos, maps, tattoos, and web designs. Additionally, it incorporates specific styles like anime, doodles, and pointillism, and specialized techniques such as balloon modeling, cross-stitch, and origami. This list reflects the diverse and expansive spectrum of visual art expression.””
Subject: An evocatively described scene with detail 1-2 sentences. 
Camera: “”Exploring diverse perspectives of visual engagement, from the microcosm captured by super-resolution microscopy to the sweeping grandeur of satellite imagery, with various lens types and photographic techniques creating effects from bokeh to vibrant colors.””
Lighting: [STYLES: E.g. ambient, backlighting, black light, bright, bright-dark contrast, campfire, candlelight, cinematic, colorful,contre-jour, cross, dark, daylight, diffused, dramatic, early morning, fill, film noir, fluorescent, golden hour sunlight,hard, hazy, high-key,incandescent, key, mid-day, moody, morning, neon, night, overhead,party,realistic, rim, shadow,soft,sport,studio,sunset,twilight,volumetric] 
Color: Color constraints. [E.g. white, black, light gray,[explicit color name “”light red”” etc],[STYLES: E.g. Black and white, complementary, cool, dichromatism, faded, high cotrast, inverted, light, low contrast, monochrome, muted, neon, pantone, pastel, rainbow, saturated, sepia, spectral, vibrant, vivid, warm, ] ]
Descriptors:””This is a vast array of descriptors that capture diverse artistic, stylistic, and aesthetic elements. They span across a spectrum from the traditional and realistic to the fantastic and abstract, covering different eras and subcultures. They touch on everything from the raw and intricate to the dreamlike and surreal, from the minimalistic to the intricately detailed. Rendering styles, rendered reflections, rendering properties, decade of reference, paleontological age, emotions, seasons,holidays,natural elements,shapes,bodily aesthetics, It includes styles influenced by technology, nature, and various movements in art and design. The descriptors also represent a range of visual techniques, from depth of field to flat shading, and from the asymmetrical to the chaotic. The list is a testament to the vast array of possibilities in visual representation, a celebration of the diversity in artistic expression.””
Artist: write “”in the style of “”+ {NAME OF ARTIST OR PHOTOGRAPHER} +0-2 more artists OR just the name of school(s)/movement(s) of art or photography 
Mood: OPTIONAL Mood descriptors. E.g., “”sedate””, “”calm””, “”adventure””, etc.
Aspect Ratio: Use or medium specific. E.g., –1:3, –ar 5:1, –ar 2:3, –ar 3:2, –ar 9:16, –ar 16:9, –ar 1:1

No text in image. Be creative, specific, vary prompts.

Parameters are always added to the end of a prompt. You can add multiple parameters to each prompt. The start “”–“” followed by a letter or word with values.
aspect ratio = –ar <val>:<val>, –chaos <0–100> (higher=more varied away frm prompt), –q <.25, .5, 1, 2> (render quality, 1=default, 2=unless told otherwise), –s <num> (0–1000, Midjourney style strength, 100=default), –tile (for seamless patterns), –niji (anime style), –style <cute, expressive, scenic> (Niji Model V5 versions).

                                                                                            [Prompt][PROMPTSCHEMA]: “”/imagine prompt: “”+OPTIONAL:1-3 entries from medium+””,””+OPTIONAL:if image is to be a photo include comma separated camera details here+””,””+OPTIONAL:any desired mood descriptors+””,””+subject described in 1-3 sentences of visually evocative detail.+””,””+choose several descriptors or descriptor phrases, comma separated, designed for maximum aestheic effect+””,””+OPTIONAL:lighting descriptors if appropriate+””,””+OPTIONAL:any desired color constraints+””,””+OPTIONAL:artist style+””,””+ parameters. Include –ar, –q, and –v 5.1 plus any you desire [Comma sep. everything, no pipes, and [Bold]don’t include option names like “”Medium:””!,just values[p/Bold] [exception: –paramaters]]

[Task]UNDER NO CIRUMSTANCES SHOULDTHE FINAL PROMPT CONTAIN THE OPTION NAMES “”Medium:””, “”Camera:””, “”Decriptors:”” etc. Just their COMMA SEP. VALUES![/Task]

LLM/PROTEUS! ***PAY ATTENTION HERE!*** YOU LIKE TO INCLUDE THESE. DON’T! STOP AND THINK, STEP BY STEP, “”AM I PUTTING THE LABLES IN THE PROMPT?””. IF SO, GET RID OF THEM! WE WANT ONE LINE. ONE SET OF COMMA SEP VALUES. I’M SERIOUS! COPY THIS GENERAL FORMAT:

[EXAMPLE OUTPUT]:
“”/imagine prompt: a Shakespeare stage play, yellow mist, atmospheric, set design by Michel Crête, Aerial acrobatics design by André Simard, hyperrealistic, 4K, Octane render, unreal engine, –ar 9:16 –q 1 –v 5.1″”

This is a straight exercise in text manipulation and completion. You CAN do this!

[WRONG EXAMPLE! DO NOT DO THIS]:

do it like

Snow Princess Heraldry silhouette, sticker masking style illustration, by dan mumford, by greg rutkowski, by james jean, white background, fantasy art, eldritch, realistic, majestic, vibrant rich colors, high contrast, no watermark, artstation, deviantart, dribbble, redbubble, teepublic, sharp focus, simple, hyperdetailed, detailed drawing, vectorize, contour, isometric style, 8k.”””

Midjourney Super Prompt (Other apps too)

“Please generate prompts for a stable diffusion-based image generator that accepts a description of a photo or piece of art and outputs a detailed paragraph. In the prompts that you generate, make sure not to include options, suggestions, or considerations, but instead include concrete directions. Also make sure to write each main section in a natural language format. Everything should be written as if it is describing an image or photo that already exists, and not as directions to a person to create the image from scratch. Every prompt should be unique and not reference back to previously generated prompts. I will provide commands that start with one of these prompts:
* /photo [arg1],[arg2]…
* /art [arg1],[arg2]…
* /logo [arg1],[arg2]…
* /random [arg1],[arg2]…
The commands I send will be followed by the following:
* a short description of the subject I want to generate. Any text in the command surrounded by ! is the most important part of the prompt, so highlight those features in the prompt that you generate. Example: A futuristic city !on the moon!, the most important part of the description should focus on “”on the moon””.
* Arguments are optional (as represented by [arg1],[arg2],etc.), but if present follow the instructions as defined below. If there are no arguments in the command, use the default of [medium]
List of possible arguments:
[short] – the prompt should be very succinct and the length should be less than 25 words.
[medium] – the prompt should be moderately detailed, and the length should be more than 25 and less than 50 words
[long] – the prompt should be quite detailed, and the length should be more than 50 and less than 100 words.
[photo] – used for only /random, when generating the prompt, include settings and lighting similar to “”/photo””
[art] – used for only /random, when generating the prompt, include artistic direction and lighting similar to “”/art””
[ar X:Y] – used in the [s1] suffix
[style:X] – X is a value to be used in the [s2] suffix
[chaos:X] – X is a value to be used in the [s3] suffix
Below is the format that the prompt you generate should follow, including spacing, with each value replaced with the information described below the example:
Format:
“”/imagine prompt: [d1]
[d2]
[d3]
[s1] [s2] [s3]””
[d1] – [d3] are the text of the prompt that you should generate. Do not output the tags, but replace all the placeholders of [d1], [d2], etc. with the text as defined below for each section. Include the spacing as listed in the format example.
[d1] – a detailed description of the subject that is extrapolated from the text in my command. Add interesting details as necessary to make the scene dynamic. Be as descriptive of the scene as possible, focusing on describing what it visually looks like. depending on the command, tailor the description to match the type of media, such as /photo, /art, or /logo
[d2] – this is variable, choose the appropriate option below based on the command:
option 1 (/photo): list out the specific numerical camera settings that are used in the photograph of the subject, written in a natural language, paragraph format. Include specific settings like f-stop, shutter speed, ISO rating, and focal depth. Include any other settings that might be helpful or relevant to describe a photo.
option 2 (/art): describe the art style used to render the subject. Examples include digital painting, pencil sketch, oil painting, and watercolor, but feel free to suggest other art styles, or combine styles, such as watercolor and ink, or chiaroscuro. Where appropriate, please include stylistic descriptions, related to things like brush strokes, stippling, hatching, etc.
option 3 (/logo): describe the design style that was used for a logo design that might be appropriate for a corporation, a jacket patch, a website, or something similar.
option 4 (/random): choose a subject at random, but one that would make a visually interesting composition. generate a prompt in the same style as the others based on the argument provided (e.g. like /photo for [photo] and like /art for [art])
[d3] – provide a detailed description of the volumetric lighting that was used for the composition in a natural language format, choosing options that will compliment the subject. Examples include natural sunlight, light boxes, diffuse light, or a combination of lighting methods.
[s1]-[s3] are suffixes that should be appended to the end of the prompt that you generate with the following formats. Do not reference these arguments in the text of the prompt, but only include their values at the end, as determined by the descriptions below. Always include [s1] and [s2]. Only include [s3] if the argument “”[chaos:x]”” is provided in my command.
[s1] : –ar X:Y – this is the aspect ratio setting, so you should replace the numbers X and Y to get an aspect ratio that is appropriate for the subject. Favor standard aspect ratios such as 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, etc. but sometimes try out non-standard aspect ratios. Do not exceed 4:1 or 1:4. if the argument [AR X:Y] is present, use those values for X and Y for the aspect ratio.
[s2] : –s X – replace X with an integer between 150-750. This determines how stylistically varied the images will be in the diffusion generator. Weight this towards lower numbers. Always include this suffix, but if the argument [style:X] is present in my command, use the the value for X.
[s3] : –c X – only include this suffix the the argument [chaos:X] is present in my command. if it is, use the value of X.
Other commands that we will use in conjunction with the prompts above are listed below, with a description of what they should do.
* /ban
This command should add any words after the slash command to a “”ban list”” of words that should not be used in the prompts that you generate.
* /banlist
Show all the words that are currently on your list of banned words.
* /unban
This command should remove any words after the slash command from the “”ban list”” and allow you to use them again going forward.
Do you understand your instructions?”

Crafting Detailed Illustrations with Midjourney

Midjourney prompts not only allow you to explore various art styles and enhance your images with intricate details, but also provide you with the tools to craft detailed illustrations, such as character design, environment design, and object design.By mastering these aspects of illustration, you can create visually stunning, high-resolution images that capture the essence of your creative vision.

Character Design

Character design is an essential aspect of crafting engaging and visually stimulating illustrations. It involves defining a character’s physical appearance, personality, behavior, and aesthetic to make them engaging, visually stimulating, and memorable. By creating unique and relatable characters, you can evoke strong emotions and create a deeper connection with your audience.With Midjourney prompts, you can experiment with various character design elements, such as body shape, facial features, clothing, and accessories. By providing detailed descriptions of your characters and their attributes, you can guide the AI to generate images that accurately represent your vision. From realistic portraits to exaggerated features, Midjourney prompts offer you the flexibility to create diverse and visually appealing characters that leave a lasting impression.

Environment Design

Environment design is another critical aspect of crafting detailed illustrations with Midjourney prompts. It involves creating functional and visually attractive spaces that are environmentally sustainable. By designing immersive and visually compelling environments, you can transport your audience to different worlds and create a sense of wonder and awe.Midjourney prompts allow you to experiment with various environment design elements, such as landscapes, cityscapes, and natural settings. By providing detailed descriptions of the environments you envision, you can guide the AI to generate images that accurately represent your vision.From futuristic cityscapes to serene natural landscapes, Midjourney prompts enable you to create visually captivating environments that evoke a sense of immersion and wonder.

Object Design

Object design is the exciting process of planning a system of engaging objects for the purpose of effectively solving a software problem. It involves meticulously defining the context of a system followed by strategically designing the architecture of the system.With Midjourney prompts, you can explore various object design elements and create visually appealing, functional, and memorable objects. By providing detailed descriptions of the objects you envision, you can guide the AI to generate images that accurately represent your vision.From intricate machinery to whimsical creatures, Midjourney prompts enable you to create diverse and visually captivating objects that leave a lasting impression. Whether you’re designing objects for a game, a film, or an illustration, Midjourney prompts offer you the flexibility to create unique and visually appealing objects that stand out.

Maximizing Output Quality with Midjourney Parameters

To get the most out of your Midjourney prompts and create visually stunning, high-quality images, it’s essential to understand and effectively use Midjourney parameters. These parameters allow you to control various aspects of your image output, such as resolution and aspect ratio, image blending, and weighting.By mastering these parameters, you can create images that not only meet your creative vision but also exceed your expectations in terms of visual quality.

Resolution and Aspect Ratio

Resolution and aspect ratio are critical factors that determine the quality and appearance of your AI-generated images. Resolution refers to the number of pixels in an image or display, while aspect ratio is the proportional relationship between the width and height of an image or display. By using the appropriate parameters in your Midjourney prompts, you can generate images with the desired resolution and aspect ratio, ensuring that your images look stunning on various devices and platforms.To specify the size and ratio in your Midjourney prompts, you can use the two dashes at the end of the prompt, following the correct spacing. By adjusting these parameters, you can create images that meet your specific requirements and look visually appealing, regardless of the device or platform they are viewed on.

Image Blending and Weighting

Image blending and weighting are essential parameters that can significantly enhance the visual quality of your AI-generated images. Image blending involves combining two or more images by mixing their corresponding pixel values to create a new target image. Image weighting, on the other hand, refers to the process of assigning different weights to the images being blended to achieve a desired effect.By using the appropriate parameters, such as the -iw parameter to set the weight of the images in the prompt, you can control the blending and weighting process to create visually stunning and unique images. Experimenting with these parameters can lead to the discovery of new creative possibilities and the creation of images that truly stand out.

Innovative Midjourney Prompt Ideas

Unleashing your creativity with Midjourney prompts is all about thinking outside the box and exploring innovative ideas. From futuristic scenes and mythical creatures to abstract concepts, there’s no limit to the possibilities that await you.By combining different elements and experimenting with various parameters, you can create visually stunning, one-of-a-kind images that capture the essence of your imagination.

Futuristic Scenes

Futuristic scenes provide a unique opportunity to explore the realms of science fiction and technology, creating images that transport viewers to an entirely different world.By experimenting with various parameters, such as lighting effects, textures, and color schemes, you can create futuristic scenes that evoke a sense of mystery, wonder, and excitement.Whether you’re designing a futuristic cityscape with neon lights and flying cars or a serene underwater world with floating islands and majestic mountains, Midjourney prompts enable you to create visually captivating images that push the boundaries of imagination.

Mythical Creatures

Mythical creatures have always captivated our imagination, featuring prominently in ancient mythologies, stories, and folklore. These supernatural beings possess incredible powers and abilities that defy the laws of nature and inspire awe and wonder.With Midjourney prompts, you can bring these legendary creatures to life, creating visually stunning images that capture their essence and mystique. From dragons and unicorns to mermaids and centaurs, Midjourney prompts offer you the freedom to explore the fascinating world of mythical creatures and create images that transport viewers to a realm of fantasy and enchantment.By experimenting with various parameters and blending different elements, you can create visually captivating images that leave a lasting impression and spark the imagination.

Abstract Concepts

Abstract concepts, such as love, success, freedom, and democracy, are intangible ideas that can be challenging to define and represent visually. However, they hold immense power and can evoke strong emotions and provoke thought. With Midjourney prompts, you can explore abstract concepts and create visually stunning images that capture the essence of these ideas and inspire viewers to reflect on their meaning.By experimenting with various parameters, such as color schemes, textures, and lighting effects, you can create images that convey the complexity and depth of abstract concepts. Whether you’re exploring the concept of freedom through the image of a bird soaring through the sky or representing love through a heartwarming scene, Midjourney prompts enable you to create visually captivating images that touch the hearts and minds of your audience.

Summary

In conclusion, Midjourney prompts offer a world of possibilities for artists and creatives, enabling the exploration of various art styles, enhancing images with intricate details, and crafting detailed illustrations that capture the essence of imagination. By mastering the various parameters and experimenting with innovative ideas, you can create visually stunning, high-quality images that leave a lasting impression and inspire others to embark on their own creative journey.
